fields.name: Effect:
fields.value: Attack another player for 1 HP. Apply 1 phase of Burning if undefended.

fields.name: Upgraded:
fields.value:
Attack another player for 3 HP. Apply 1 phase of Burning, and 2 more if undefended.

*Stackable. Status takes effect next phase. Read <#1191650444594909354> for more information on player statuses.*
